column4: any system builder types around? if you take the heat sink off the cpu and wish to remount it, is it mandatory that you need to replace the grey gooey stuff usually present in heatsinks?  (when ytou take a heatsink off the goo is usually missing/displaced) ?
it is? this is an amd cpu yes

YES...if you value your processor and want to be 100% sure that it'll survive, clean both the processor and heatsink with rubbing alcohol and polish to a shine...then find some more thermal paste to put on it before reinstalling
